"Read this book! The road map and resources shared in

empowered me to do what I have always wanted to do: own a bunch of real-estate headache free. Turnkey investing, the Clothier way, allows you to analyze, buy, and benefit from buy-and-hold real estate without dealing with the potatoes stuck in the toilets. Chris offers a straightforward, illuminating education for any investor or would-be investor who wants to leverage real estate and its benefits without pitfalls. This book lets me master, buy, and hold real estate, leveraging the best education and professionals in the business."--

For the past 10 years, I have written a blog for real estate investors and published it on the Memphis Invest website.  During this time, I was writing hundreds of articles for the real estate in vesting forum site, Bigger Pockets.  Writing The Turnkey Revolution, became a natural progression of having spent so many hours working with and writing about my interactions with thousands of real estate investors.  Those blog articles and investing articles on Bigger Pockets were the springboard for this book!The stories you read and the investors mentioned are real with only their names changed.  Watching investors make both good and bad decisions and having a front-row seat to a company growing from one person into a $100M company managing over $600M in real estate assets gives me a unique perspective into how successful investors make decisions.Add to that the fact that I myself have both failed and succeeded as an investor and The Turnkey Revolution becomes a pretty good field guide to buying single-family homes passively and smartly!  I am proud of this book and the fact that is captures my families company, our dreams, our integrity and beliefs and the hard work of our team so perfectly.  I sincerely hope you enjoy the book and find the courage to take your own steps into The Turnkey Revolution.   Best, Chris

Christopher D. Clothier manages the development and implementation of sales and marketing for Memphis Invest. He helps potential investors define their purpose for investing in real estate and educates peer companies on best practices in the emerging turnkey real estate industry. He is a contributing columnist for BiggerPockets and an experienced speaker who regularly addresses audiences of real estate investors and business professionals.
